GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object of the selected review

exampleResponse.title: Jenga
exampleResponse.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: allows an update to be made to the selected review

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of objects containing the comments for the selected review

POST /api/reviews/review_id/comments.description: allows the client to post a comment to the selected review and returns the new comment

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: allows the client to delete a comment
